enGB: At 3rd rank, Aeon receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. They can either choose to take it as part of an existing spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
At 3rd rank, Azata receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. They can either choose to take it as part of an existing spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
At 3rd rank, Demon receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. They can either choose to take it as part of an existing spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
At 3rd rank, Trickster receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. They can either choose to take it as part of an existing spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
